manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

products.manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

summary: 1998 ISUZU HOMBRE 4X4, 5SPD, 4.3 LITER  THERE ARE MULTIPLE ARES THAT NEED TO BE ADDRESSED.  1.  THE PARKING BRAKE DOES NOT KEEP THE VEHICLE FROM ROLLING BACKWARDS ON EVEN THE SMALLEST HILLS.  2.  THE PASSENGERS SEAT WILL NOT LATCH AFTER IT HAS BEEN PUSHED FORWARD THEN BACK INTO POSITION.  IT MUST BE SLAMMED TO GET IT TO LATCH  3.  THE COOLING SYSTEM IS INADEQUATE.  ON HOT DAYS WITH AC ON IT WILL OVERHEAT WHILE GOING UP HILLS OR GOING OFF ROAD.
